items.title: Big News Coming "Soon"
items.content: I'm not going to spoil the surprise, but hopefully within the next few weeks I'll have some big news to share with you all.

items.title: Offline Support
items.content: Make Your Max is now usable offline! If there are any issues with this, please report it using the feedback link.

items.title: UI Overhaul
items.content: The UI has been overhauled to make the mobile experience feel more intuitive.
